AppSettings.title: AppSettings
AppSettings.description: Stores global application settings, including the enablement status of various modules. There should typically be only one record of this entity.

id.description: Unique identifier for the AppSettings entity. Recommended value: 'global'.

modules.description: A JSON string representing an object where keys are module names (e.g., 'projects', 'finance') and values are boolean indicating whether the module is enabled or disabled. This is stored as a string due to schema nesting limitations.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the application settings record was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the application settings record was last updated.

NavigationSettings.title: NavigationSettings
NavigationSettings.description: Stores the global configuration for the sidebar navigation, including the custom order of modules.

order.description: An ordered array of module IDs representing their position in the sidebar.

MarketValidation.title: MarketValidation
MarketValidation.description: Stores market analysis and competitor intelligence for specific project verticals and scopes.

scope_type.description: The service combination being validated (e.g. AI Content + Social Media).

competitor_summary.description: Summary of common competitor offerings in this niche.

avg_budget_range.description: Average industry budget for this scope.

opportunity_gap.description: Specific gaps in the market that can be exploited.

Client.title: Client
Client.description: Represents a client of the media production company, storing their contact details and related information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Client entity.

name.description: The official name of the client or the primary contact person's full name.

contactPerson.description: The primary contact person at the client company.

email.description: The primary email address for the client contact.

phone.description: The primary phone number for the client contact.

address.description: The physical address of the client company.

companyName.description: The full legal name of the client's company.

notes.description: Any additional notes or comments about the client.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the client record was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the client record was last updated.

TeamMember.title: TeamMember
TeamMember.description: Represents an internal employee or core team member of the media production company, excluding authentication details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the TeamMember entity.

firstName.description: The first name of the team member.

lastName.description: The last name of the team member.

email.description: The email address of the team member, used for external authentication system linking and communication.

phone.description: The primary phone number for the team member.

role.description: The role or position of the team member within the company (e.g., 'Producer', 'Editor', 'Administrator').

bio.description: A short biography or description of the team member's expertise.

avatarUrl.description: URL to the team member's profile picture or avatar.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the team member record was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the team member record was last updated.

definition.description: Stores market analysis and competitor intelligence.
